productName: DCP-T820DW Ink Tank Printer Business savings with duplex, high-speed multifunction printer
description:
A4 print speed up to 17 ipm (Black)/ 16.5 ipm (Colour)
WiFi, AirPrint, Mopria, WiFi Direct, LAN, USB 2.0
Auto 2-sided (Duplex) printing, 20 sheets Auto-Document Feeder (ADF), 1-line LCD, 128 MB Memory, 150 Sheets Paper Tray
Full ink bottles included. Yield up to 15,000/5000 pages (black/colour)*
Compatible with Mobile Connect App**, iPrint&Scan Desktop App & BR Admin**
1 Year on-site warranty included
